name: supernumerary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in addition to the number usually needed: Supernumerary teeth often are found in the upper jaw just behind the front teeth.

an extra employee, actor, member of a society, etc.: They're supernumeraries, the people on an opera stage who neither speak nor sing, yet whose presence in the production is crucial.
